title: yukthamu gadhu
sahitya:
yuktamu gadu nanu rakSincaka uNDEdi rAma



anupallavi



bhaktavatsala patita pAvana trishaktiyu galgina dEvuDu nIvE



caraNam



toli duSkrtamula naNace nI birudilanu daDusu konEnO paliki bonkaDanu 
nI kIrtiyu nE bAgalEdu anEnO munu telisi teliyani nI dAsula brOva dEva
daya 
rAnanenO velasina bhaktula kE nI shaktiyu selavai pOyenO delpumu

caraNam 2

 vaddayuNDu jnakAtmaja balka vaddanEnO lEka nindura jituDati kOpamu
tODanu nIkEla anenO mudduga bharatu-Dananda bASpamula ganula nincenO 
padduna pavana sutuDu vaddani nI padamu baTTu konenO delpumu
   
caraNam 3

 callani nI bhaktiyu lEdani vidhi kallalADu konenO nAvalla gAdani
palukuceli 
mikkili vArtalADu konenO ullamunanu shrI tyAgarAju ninnuncukona
maracenO cellalaina dharmasamvardhani cerabOku manenO delpumu
